Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Schneider CCTFR6400 Thermostat Homey App

Features:
- Bidirectional communication with thermostat via Zigbee binding
- Temperature, humidity, and battery monitoring
- Heating demand control \(flame icon, 0-100%\)
- Button press detection and setpoint sync
- Screen wake/sleep tracking
- Anti-drift polling every 10 minutes
- French and English localization

Known limitation: Boost mode cannot be synced \(thermostat doesn''t report boost temperature\)
